message.body: Hey Hunter. Mark's brother Kurt here. Not sure what your schedule looks like these days but my house needs work. Please let me know your availability. Th

Hey Kurt. I teach on Mondays and Tuesdays but I'm mostly available the rest of the week. If you have available internet shoot me an email with a list of things you need to accomplish at the property. I can probably come by tomorrow or Thursday and give you an estimate or work out a rate for work
Hey Hunter. Thanks for getting back to me. I don't have your email so I'll sum it up in a nut shell. Sistering joists under bathroom. Installing ply, har
diebacker, shower, toliet, water heater,etc. Be there weds or thurs. Let me know. Thanks.
I can come tomorrow. Morning would be best. I got another job starting up soon, so it would be good to get started Thursday on yours. We'll talk tomorrow
